alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 5:04PM EDT until July 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Maple Street near the Red River Ranch is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.3 feet this evening. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM EDT.
